div.bibl: The Chicago Daily News (Morning Issue), Nov. 21, 1890. [RUSSIAN LITERARY CLUB GIVES ENTERTAINMENT]

body.p: The first entertainment of the Russian Literary Club took place last evening at Emerson Hall. The program consisted of Russian national music and a one-act play entitled "The Secret Order."
The officers of the new society are A. Shkarevitch, president; Mrs. Levin, secretary; and Miss Dvorkin, treasurer.
The entertainments will take place weekly.
